messages.content: Judith Bunting is the only candidate who will challenge the Conservative Government on their hard Brexit plans.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Under the Conservatives, our NHS and care services are under threat. I will fight a Hard Brexit and oppose Tory cuts to our public services.

mentions.candidate: Judith Bunting is a scientist, medical journalist and broadcaster. Judith lives in Newbury and has two adult children. Judith is a passionate campaigner for local people, businesses and communities.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: There is a strong chance that Theresa May will return to Number 10 as Prime Minister with a landslide majority.
mentions.partyLeader: Newbury needs a Liberal Democrat MP who will stand up to Theresa May and speak up for the interests of Newbury and West Berkshire, an MP who will fight a Hard Brexit and oppose Tory cuts to our public services.

issues.brexitEurope: Judith Bunting is the only candidate who will challenge the Conservative Government on their hard Brexit plans. Newbury needs a Liberal Democrat MP who will fight a Hard Brexit.
issues.economy: A huge majority, the Conservatives will bulldoze through a Hard Brexit and cuts to public services that threaten our economy and make our country more divided and intolerant.
issues.education: Under the Conservatives, state school budgets are being slashed.
issues.environment: There is a housing crisis and an air pollution crisis.
issues.health: Under the Conservatives, our NHS and care services are under threat. Newbury needs a Liberal Democrat MP who will oppose Tory cuts to our public services.

community.content: Judith is a passionate campaigner for local people, businesses and communities.

images.caption: Judith Bunting is the only candidate who will challenge the Conservative Government on their hard Brexit plans.

examples: There is a strong chance that Theresa May will return to Number 10 as Prime Minister with a landslide majority.
Judith Bunting is a scientist, medical journalist and broadcaster.
Judith lives in Newbury and has two adult children.
Judith is a passionate campaigner for local people, businesses and communities.

I want to live in a country that cares about having decent public services and decent housing, a country that gives every child a good education and a job to look forward to, a country that values and protects the environment.
Judith is a passionate campaigner for local people, businesses and communities.
Judith Bunting is the only candidate who will challenge the Conservative Government on their hard Brexit plans.
Newbury needs a Liberal Democrat MP who will fight a Hard Brexit and oppose Tory cuts to our public services.
Under the Conservatives, our NHS and care services are under threat.
There is a housing crisis and an air pollution crisis.
There is a housing crisis and an air pollution crisis.
Under the Conservatives, our NHS and care services are under threat.
Under the Conservatives, state school budgets are being slashed.
There is a strong chance that Theresa May will return to Number 10 as Prime Minister with a landslide majority.
